meta.homeDescription: Book museum tickets easily with our AI-powered chatbot. Skip the lines and get instant confirmations.
meta.exhibitionsDescription: Explore our current and upcoming exhibitions showcasing extraordinary art, history, and culture.
meta.ticketsDescription: Book your museum tickets online and avoid queues. Various ticket options available.

auth.accountCreated: Your account has been created successfully
auth.logoutMessage: You have been logged out successfully

hero.title: Discover Art, History, and Culture
hero.subtitle: Book your tickets instantly and skip the lines with our intelligent booking assistant.

featuredExhibitions.title: Featured Exhibitions
featuredExhibitions.subtitle: Discover our current and upcoming exhibitions that showcase extraordinary art, history, and culture.

tickets.title: Tickets & Admission
tickets.subtitle: Choose from a variety of ticket options to best suit your visit. Book online to avoid queues and secure your preferred time slot.
tickets.groupInfo: Special rates for groups of 10+ and educational institutions.
tickets.noTickets: You don't have any tickets yet.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our intelligent chatbot makes booking tickets quick and easy, eliminating long queues and wait times.
howItWorks.step1Description: Open our chatbot assistant and tell it what you're looking for in natural language.
howItWorks.step2Description: The chatbot will help you select the right tickets based on your preferences.
howItWorks.step3Description: Pay securely through our integrated payment gateway with multiple options.
howItWorks.step4Description: Get digital tickets instantly via email with QR codes for quick entry.

testimonials.title: What Visitors Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from visitors who have used our chatbot ticket booking system.

chatbotFeatures.title: Intelligent Booking Assistant
chatbotFeatures.description: Our multilingual chatbot is designed to make your museum visit planning seamless and efficient. It understands natural language, learns from interactions, and provides personalized recommendations.
chatbotFeatures.multilingualDesc: Chat in your preferred language with support for over 10 languages including English, Spanish, French, and German.
chatbotFeatures.aiPoweredDesc: Receive personalized exhibition and ticket suggestions based on your interests, time constraints, and previous visits.
chatbotFeatures.availabilityDesc: Plan your visit and book tickets any time of day or night, with instant confirmation and digital ticket delivery.
chatbotFeatures.secureDesc: Our integrated payment system ensures your payment information is encrypted and processed securely.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates on new exhibitions, events, and special offers.
newsletter.policy: By subscribing, you agree to receive marketing communications from us. You can unsubscribe at any time.
newsletter.successMessage: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter!
newsletter.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address.

footer.description: Revolutionizing the museum experience with intelligent ticketing solutions.

chatbot.title: Museum Assistant
chatbot.demoMessage1: Hello! I'm your museum booking assistant. How can I help you today?
chatbot.demoReply1: Hi! I'd like to visit the museum this weekend. What exhibitions are available?
chatbot.demoMessage2: Great! This weekend we have three special exhibitions: "Ancient Egypt: The Eternal Life", "Modern Masters", and "Digital Frontiers". Would you like more information about any of these?
chatbot.demoReply2: The Ancient Egypt one sounds interesting! How much are tickets and what time should I come?
chatbot.demoMessage3: The "Ancient Egypt" exhibition is very popular! Tickets are $25 per person, or included with our Premium Pass ($32). I recommend visiting between 10-11 AM or after 3 PM for smaller crowds. How many tickets would you like?
chatbot.voiceBookingIntro: You can now book tickets using your voice. Try it out!
chatbot.customerCareIntro: Need more help? Speak directly with our customer service representative.

customerCare.title: Customer Care
customerCare.howToConnect: How would you like to connect?
customerCare.availabilityNote: Our customer service team is available 9am-5pm, Monday to Friday. Outside these hours, please leave a message and we'll get back to you.

voiceBooking.title: Voice Booking
voiceBooking.browserNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support voice recognition
voiceBooking.tryTextChat: Please use text chat instead or try with a different browser.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.paymentSuccessMessage: Your payment has been processed successfully. Your tickets are available in the 'My Tickets' section.
checkout.securePaymentDesc: All payment information is encrypted and processed securely.

myTickets.title: My Tickets
myTickets.noTickets: You don't have any tickets yet.
